title: Passpartout The Starving Artist
description:
Passpartout The Starving Artist game for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRIP
Passpartout puts you into the shoes of a French artist trying to navigate the beautifully confusing art scene . Paint and sell your own art to survive your expensive wine and baguette addiction. In Passpartout: The Starving Artist, you won’t be able to sit still. You will have to save money and start working early, draw different pictures, so that they do not repeat themselves, create masterpieces, participate in exhibitions and communicate with various characters. Rogue Tower
The more you draw and the more paintings you sell, the more you will earn. But do not rush to spend what you have earned – first pay all the bills and recoup the money spent on the tool. In general, if you are a fan of unusual games and indie projects, then this simulator will definitely appeal to you. Become an artist, start painting and try to feel for yourself how it is to be a creative person with a subtle nature.
